K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-1: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta aa yurdzny'a na hri da ya n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-3: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-6: bcom ldan 'das gangg'a tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-7: na dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:241b-8: chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams @242a *//
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-1: la bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-3: 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-4: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-5: de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-7: su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-8: de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-9: 'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-10: dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-11: de na bud med yod pa min //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-12: mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-13: rin chen rnams kyi padmo las //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-15: zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-16: chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-17: sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-19: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-20: bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-21: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-22: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-24: bsam mi khyab la dad byas na //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-25: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-26: rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242a-30: 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-0: rgyar dpag tshad khri bzhi yod pa zhig @242b yod de; rgyal rigs su skyes so //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-4: / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-6: gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-8: rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-11: zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-13: snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-16: bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-17: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-18: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-19: bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-22: mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-24: dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:242b-27: nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-0: sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te de bzhin gshegs @243a *//
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-1: pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-2: zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-3: ma yengs par bsgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-4: ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-5: dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-6: dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-7: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yang lag phyag byas
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-8: la sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-10: zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-11: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-13: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243a-16: 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-1: dzva la pa ra tstshe da ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-2: su kha ba ti ni rde she /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-4: a'a yurga rbha ni rah'a ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-7: nirbu dhi a'a k'a sha ni rdza te /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-8: a'a k'a sha ni rde she //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-9: a'a k'a sha ni rku sha la /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-10: a'a k'a sha ni rda rasha ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-11: a'a k'a sha aa dhishth'a ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-12: su kha ba ti aa dhi shth'a ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-14: tsa tv'a ri dharma pra sa dha ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-15: tsa tv'a ri a'arya sa tya pra s'a dha ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-16: tsa tv'a ri marga bha ba na pra s'a dha na /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-17: ba la p'irya pra s'a dha ni /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-20: ku sha la ni rde she /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-21: ku sha la pra tishth'a ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-34: ku le pra te ku le /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-39: dharmme tsa dha rme ba le tsa ba le /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-40: aa nu sha aa ba le /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-41: buddha a'a k'a sha gu ne buddh'a /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-42: a'a k'a sha ni rgu ne /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-43: aa mri ta du du bhi sva ra sv'a h'a /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-46: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-47: sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-48: pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des gos
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:243b-49: gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-1: pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-3: byang chub kyi snying po padma'i gnas dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-4: byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-5: la bya'o; ;de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-11: rgyal po ni rin po che'i padma rnam par snang
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-12: ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-14: padma'i gad na ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-15: rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-16: g-yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-17: g-yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to; ;dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-19: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-21: gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-22: gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244a-23: sna bdun gyi padma chen po dag la brdzus te
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-0: dge bsnyen ma gang la @244b la bcom ldan 'das
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-2: dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-6: gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-8: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-9: la yang ma gtogs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-12: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-16: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-18: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12D0676=D0850_H0649:244b-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pun+ya sam bha wa dang /
